name: Rogue Xmas 3D
description:
Christmas Mood - but, in form of Aerial Combat!
Download, Play, Enjoy!
Report bugs and suggestions as well, please.
Mini-game, "tech-demo", my first ever public release of anything playable.
Flyable "Santa's Sleigh", first and third person views, also "cameras-on-enemies" view mode, and Slo-Mo Pause Mode with variable slowdown.
See in game toggle-able ("H") full list of controls.
There are no goals, except having fun!
Flying Robo-Raindeer, Snowman Laser Turrets, and some other things to shoot at for fun :)
You can respawn "enemies", so that fun can continue, if desired.
Disclaimer: no humans, nor deer, nor Santa get hurt here, no.
In fact, no human or animal targets in any of my projects or assets.
Speaking of those, consider this small fun piece as a "warm-up" for my dream project:
Rogue Velocity 3D
At the same time, this is a public "test bed" for mechanics and features I provide in my Unreal Engine Marketplace Sci-Fi assets:
https://unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/ThunderOwl+Studios

Music tracks from "Royalty Free Planet":
